name: The Princess and the Sword
description:
Jump into 'The Princess and the Sword' and join Corellia, the Princess of Delval, on her adventure through a realm of Gods and Heroes!

A game inspired by series like Legend of Zelda and The Elder Scrolls!

This is another piece that I have completed for my Games Design University course, and my second attempt at a visual novel.

Absolutely, 100% non-profit.
